sen.j: 佐保姫（さほひめ）は春の神。
sen.e: "Saho-hime" is the god of spring.
"Saho-hime" is the god of spring.
Saho-hime is the god of spring.

sen.j: 五行説では春は東の方角にあたり、平城京の東に佐保山があるために春の神は佐保姫と呼ぶようになった。
sen.e: In gogyo-setsu (the theory of five elements), spring is in the east, and the god of spring was called Saho-hime, due to the fact that there is Saho-yama Mountain to the east of Heijo-kyo (the ancient capital of Japan in current Nara).

In gogyo-setsu (the theory of five elements), spring is in the east, and the god of spring was called Saho-hime, due to the fact that there is Saho-yama Mountain to the east of Heijo-kyo (the ancient capital of Japan in current Nara).

In gogyo-setsu (the theory of five elements), spring is in the east, and the god of spring was called Saho-hime, due to the fact that there is Mt. Saho to the east of Heijo-kyo (the ancient capital of Japan in current Nara).

sen.j: 白く柔らかな春霞の衣をまとう若々しい女性。
sen.e: A young woman in a dress like the soft white spring haze.
A young woman in a dress like the soft white spring haze.
She is a young woman in a dress like the soft white spring haze.
sen.cmt: she is を追加しました。

sen.j: 春の季語であり和菓子の名前に使われている。
sen.e: It is a season word for spring, and is used as a name for Japanese confectionery.
It is a seasonal word for spring, and is used as a name for Japanese confectionery.
It is a seasonal word for spring, and is used as a name for Japanese confectionery.

sen.j: 竜田山の神で秋の竜田姫と対を成す。
sen.e: She is a god of Tatsuta-yama Mountain, and is paired with Tatsuta-hime of fall.
She is a god of Tatsuta-yama Mountain, and is paired with Tatsuta-hime of fall.
She is a god of Mt. Tatsuta, and is paired with Tatsuta-hime of fall.

sen.j: 記紀におけ狭穂姫（沙本毘売）とは無関係。
sen.e: She is unrelated to Saohime (Sao-bime) of kiki (the Kojiki and Nihonshoki).
She is unrelated to Saohime (Sao-bime) of kiki (the Kojiki and Nihonshoki).
She is unrelated to Sao-hime (Sao-bime) described in kiki (the Kojiki (Records of Ancient Matters) and the Nihonshoki (Chronicles of Japan)).
sen.cmt: 記紀 の補足を追加しました。

sen.e: Refer to the page of Sahohime-no-mikoto.
Refer to the page of Sahohime-no-mikoto.
Refer to the page of Sahohime no Mikoto.
sen.cmt: 神名表現を統一しました。
